content: here s a pair of sweet little moon mitts for all your dreamiest activities wear these while * reading a mysterious time-yellowed book * playing your guitar and looking at the moon * petting a rumbly old cat * knitting of course this pattern has been minimally edited and has come straight from my brain so please feel free to let me know if there are any problems edit this pattern makes a kind of small pair of gloves - think adult women s small if you want them bigger you may want to knit at a higher gauge update october 2025 so pleased so many of you like this pattern feel free to remix make your own spin and post your free pattern and/or sell the gloves you knit from this pattern i d appreciate if you link back to the original pattern if you do though thanks d if you like these but think wow i wish they had a pumpkin on them instead you re in luck try whimsical pumpkin mitts https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/whimsical-pumpkin-mitts a remix by lena stampfli
